website_summaries.verdict: A tasteful pet memorial that will work well as a remembrance, a grave marker, or a garden stone that will last with care.
pros: Has a flat design that can be used as a grave marker or garden stone
Can also be hung on a wall
We love the paw prints and thoughtful inscription as a reminder of a special little friend
cons: Not very thick, and could break if dropped
Some customers received stones that were either darker or lighter than expected

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Product received doesn't look anything like the pictures here. Mine is very dark and the writing and paw prints are very faint as a result. Not a proper memorial for my faithful pet we had to put down recently.
customer_reviews.author: Gadget Dad

customer_reviews.title: It’s perfect!!!
customer_reviews.text: First of all if you are reading this, I’m sorry for your loss!!! Our little girl spent 14 wonderful years giving us love and laughter. She passed and broke our hearts. She deserved a simple yet powerful memorial, and this stone says it all, because if love could have saved her she would have lived forever!!! We placed it on her grave and it says it all, it shows our love and our pain. Once again, I’m sorry for your loss! Go ahead and buy this indoor/outdoor memorial as a gentle yet powerful reminder that your precious little one was loved and will be lived forever.
customer_reviews.author: Honesty is the best policy!!!

customer_reviews.title: Nice gift to someone you care about that just lost a dear pet.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a dog lover and have experienced the painful loss of many pets, mostly dogs. My neighbors are in their 70's and their dog, Zoe, passed a couple of weeks ago. They felt like they lost their child and I know how that feels. Their are no words to provide the comfort they need but I wanted to give them something to help them eventually remember all the good things and for the pain to lessen. Everyone who is suffering loss, needs friends and family to acknowledge their pain. I added the name Zoe on the item and it sits on their mantel. It was the perfect gift and not out of the ballpark costs. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Oliver

customer_reviews.title: VERY NICE  GRAVE MARKER  FOR  MY  BELOVED  DARLING , WITH 2 ROSE BUSH'S & WILD FLOWERS
customer_reviews.text: IT MARKS MY BELOVEDS GRAVE , WITH SOME ROSE BUSH'S AND WILD FLOWERS , SHE WAS MY WILD FLOWER . I MISS SILLY SOOOOOOOOOOOOO MUCH , VERY NICELY MADE MARKER FOR HER RESTING SPOT .
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: perfect message
customer_reviews.text: My daughter's dogs are a part of her family. During my chemo and the ongoing covid scare, we were not able to see her when her 12 year old rescue dog had to be put down. She described herself as "broken". I ordered what I felt might be a helpful reminder of how much that dog was loved, and they agreed. Not only was it excellent, but it was rushed earlier than promised because they seemed to know it was important, and they cared. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful stone with well expressed sentiment
customer_reviews.text: I bought one for friends who recently lost their beloved dachshund and because I liked the quality, shape, materials, words/sentiment, paw prints and that it could be used in the garden or hung on a wall with photos of your beloved animals...I bought one for myself as I have recently lost two beloved dogs. I put my friends' garden stone in a basket with a flowering plant with a condolence card. The garden stone makes a lovely way to express your sentiments and feelings for your own lost pets or someone else's. The quality and price is good.
customer_reviews.author: P. Loftis

customer_reviews.title: Memory stone for Punkin
customer_reviews.text: A week ago I had to put down my beloved dog Punkin. He was 12 1/2 . His health sent downhill fast. My wonderful vet said it was time as he has cancer and was in pain. My son-in-law was amazing and we buried him at home. I wanted to do something g special so found this great stone that said it all. I also put a solar !ight there. Many tears and much sadness but he was much loved from a 7 week old puppy 🐕 and still is.
customer_reviews.author: D. Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Nice sized memory stone
customer_reviews.text: With two sized paw prints I assume this could be used for Dog or Cat. We used if for our Dog's stone. We planted a tree in her honor and placed the stone at the base of the tree. It's not too big to be obvious, but right size for the area. The saying on the stone is very special as well. It's only been a week so I can't comment on how this stone will stand up over time. But we loved having something to place with the tree that will always remind us of our sweet, sweet Carly.
customer_reviews.author: NC072155

customer_reviews.title: Great Memorial Piece for your Pet
customer_reviews.text: This was a nice piece. I had a cat pass after 11 and half years and I was satisfied with this. It was larger than anticipated which made it real nice. It seems less durable though but not too bad. It was worth the cost. We will put it outside in the spring by the tree he was buried. It sits on our fireplace mantle beside our babies picture. I believe its helped my child seeing it - its helped all of us.
customer_reviews.author: james Byrge

customer_reviews.title: High quality. Look through entire photo album.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this plaque as a gift for a pet memorial. Even though this plaque is on the thinner side, it has a very nice weight to it and it constructed well. I actually like the flat back because it can be hung on a wall or set in a garden and either way it would look nice. The design on the front is very nice and the person this was gifted to, really loved the gift itself. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WOW!
customer_reviews.text: When I lost my dog after having Buttons for 15years no one could understand why I was so upset so when my friend lost her 'baby' after 16 years.....I wanted to let her know that someone knew what she was going through. It brought tears to her eyes and a whole lot of hugs and thank-yous. It means more than words when someone looses a 'friend'! they need to be remembered and not just gone............
customer_reviews.author: Minerva in Dunnellon FL

customer_reviews.title: My son has a dear friend who is a mason and he put walk ways and a sitting area to make a beautiful space to sit
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to put in Spikes ( our pug who passed away at nearly 18 years old ) memorial garden. My son has a dear friend who is a mason and he put walk ways and a sitting area to make a beautiful space to sit. We added perennials and a flowering crape myrtle tree to the area as well as some antique iron benches to sit. I will put this stone out once the weather gets warmer because I do not want to take the chance on it cracking due to the extreme cold. I bought another stone on Amazon for this space as well, so there will be 2 different stones added. I truly miss our little guy.
customer_reviews.author: Peg

customer_reviews.title: A Fitting Tribute to Our Very Special Pug
customer_reviews.text: Our pug, Annie, was taken from us unexpectedly during the prime of her life. The words inscribed on this stepping stone commemorate beautifully our hearts' response to her passing. We placed this stepping stone near our bedroom window. Every single morning, Annie would gaze through that window transfixed by birds, squirrels, and kitty cat visitors.
customer_reviews.author: Polarbeardr

customer_reviews.title: Puurfect
customer_reviews.text: This exactly what I was needing after I lost my cat. I blamed myself for him crossing the rainbow bridge too early. Telling myself all the would ifs and why didn'ts. After a few days of tears I told myself he is where he would loved to be. Laying in my garden and near me. That's when I found this. The words say exactly how I feel and is such a beautiful piece. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Cortnie

customer_reviews.title: Made extremely well
customer_reviews.text: I cried when I saw this. It’s made so well and was more beautiful in person than in photos. I got this for my mom because she recently lost her dog. But I will be getting one for myself too in memory of my pup that passed. It’s made for outside almost like a stepping stone but can easily be placed somewhere indoors. It’s beautiful and makes the perfect gift.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie P

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This is a truly beautiful stone. Well-crafted. It's very thin, though, so you might want to put it on top of something else like I did.
customer_reviews.author: Izzy

customer_reviews.title: We lost our pet who fell ill and although we ...
customer_reviews.text: We lost our pet who fell ill and although we took him to the vet and the specialists he didn't pull through. This plaque says what is in my heart. It helped with the guilt over having to make a difficult decision. I was going to put it in the garden but keep it in the house with his photo in the pawprints memorial photo frame.
customer_reviews.author: leesa

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful 🐶
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item for some riends, who tragically lost their 6 month old Labby to antifreeze poisoning. 😢 Their hearts were shattered. They decided to bury their boy in their yard and will now place this loving message at the site. It brought many tears...touched by the fact others care about their great loss. Regarding the product itself, it’s well-made and true to the picture shown. I would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Cyndi

customer_reviews.title: Worthy reminder of your dear, departed friend
customer_reviews.text: Just received this and am very pleased with the weight, texture, and overall quality of this memorial. It really passes in every way for carved stone. Entirely a tribute worthy of my sweet, departed 13-year old little boy (cat) and a comforting reminder.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice way to pay tribute to our special little guy
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something to put in our garden to pay tribute to our cat that passed. He was a special part of the family and we will never forget him....just thought it would be nice to have this as a memory keeper. It is perfect and states just how we feel. This arrived in new packaging and was the delivery was on time. I would recommend this seller to others.
customer_reviews.author: kimberly jo

customer_reviews.title: This piece is absolutely beautiful and I cannot say enough good things about it
customer_reviews.text: This piece is absolutely beautiful and I cannot say enough good things about it. I am heartbroken to say I lost my beloved Maltese and I wanted to plant a rose in my garden in her memory. I purchased this to mark it and it was the perfect addition. It is substantial without being too large and beautifully crafted. It arrived carefully packaged and in perfect condition. I am so sad that I had to get this, but it is a lovely way to remember her.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was expecting!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for after having to put my 15 year old cat to sleep. Appears to be well made. I will note this thing is heavier then what you think. I have placed It in her grave now but plan to make it a lot nicer with some landscaping in the spring.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product
customer_reviews.text: We gave this stone to friends after the loss of their beloved pet. It came quickly and was packaged very well. It was a nice size also. A token gift that our friends can put anywhere in their garden. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: BirdGardener

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL!
customer_reviews.text: When a dear friend lost her pet of 18 years, I wanted to find her something to let her know how sorry I was for her loss. After seaching for weeks for just the right memorial stone, I finally picked this one......SO HAPPY WITH IT!! The "stone" looks realistic and it's a great size. The words and paw prints are clear and crisp. GREAT item, for a GREAT price!!!
customer_reviews.author: littleaccent

customer_reviews.title: This is not only heavy but good sized and beautifully crafted - really worthy of a place of honor.
customer_reviews.text: Heavy stone with really good impressions of the paw prints. I was hoping this would be actually heavy enough that it would never blow away in our high winds and it's just what I was seeking. Some of the other items I got need to be anchored with other rocks to keep them in place but this seems as if it will stand the test of time and stay in place. I'm grateful it was just as advertised since it's for our family's best friend.
customer_reviews.author: MEWTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: but this was easy since they just sent me a link to click ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't usually put reviews....but this was easy since they just sent me a link to click on IF I chose to fill it out. Sooooo I will expressw that I think this is really cute!! It's durable, solid, color is true, great size, and the lettering is crisp neat and clean which definitely is not always the case!!!!! Si if your thinking of getting this, then it's a good choice.....in my opinion. I bought quite a few of these adorable garden pieces and I plan onn reviewing those as well, since I've realized more then ever lately that reviews are very important in determing if something sometimes is worth it. :)
customer_reviews.author: lauren fishman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Plaque For Pet Rememberence!
customer_reviews.text: I have never purchased any rememberence plaques before, but felt I need to honor my Rescue Cat. MOE was only 8 years old and a rescue. He was a great cat and gave so much love in return. This plaque is very nice and in all honesty, is much nicer than I thought it would be. I would recommend this to anyone who wants to have a special rememberence of a belt pet.
customer_reviews.author: LadyHawke

customer_reviews.title: lovely remembrance
customer_reviews.text: Our son's family lost their precious shih tzu recently after 14 years. They (and we) were heartbroken. This is a lovely remembrance. It won't heal their hearts, but it will help them remember the love after time passes. During this "safer at home" time, we haven't even seen the stone yet. But they think it is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Quality piece for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I just received this and am so pleased. For the price I wasn't expecting the kind of quality piece I received. I don't write a lot of product reviews but felt compelled to comment on this one. It's a hefty plaque and the carving is really well done.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Malberg

customer_reviews.title: Beloved Pet
customer_reviews.text: It meant so much to get my package delivered today. Missing my dear beloved fur baby who we had to make the agonizingly heartbreaking decision to say our final goodbye to this past Tuesday. Not disappointed at all with the quality or size.
customer_reviews.author: Inspired Dancer

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: My dog and cat passed away with-in 6 months of each other. I purchased this stone to put over their graves. It is very durable. I have had this product for 6+ years. Animals are not pets they are family. I will be purchasing one for my friend. Her dog passed away in January.
customer_reviews.author: Supernatural9

customer_reviews.title: Look over the product.
customer_reviews.text: First item had a defect/blemish on the paw. Seller immediately sent a replacement which is just fine. Wish it was made in U.S.A not China.
customer_reviews.author: Rev. John R. Neff

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful way to remember a loved pet!!
customer_reviews.text: We lost our dog recently to immune Mediated Hemolytic Anemia (he was 9 years old). It came on very suddenly, and we really miss him. This is a great idea for someone who lost a loved pet. Its very well made (its synthetic, but very heavy, and can be hung on a wall). A nice way to remember a pet who meant so much to the family.
customer_reviews.author: Review4U

customer_reviews.title: Touching way to remember
customer_reviews.text: We tragically lost our little Buddy. This plaque so perfectly fit how we felt. We plan to put it by the spot we buried him. Just need to personalize it a little more by adding his name. Would definitely recommend this product to any one in need of a remembrance of their precious pet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Garden or wall remembrance
customer_reviews.text: i really am happy with this remembrance stone. it is weighty and beautiful. Just as picture shows. there is also a tab on the back should you wish to hang it on the wall. I am going to put it next to my dog's ashes for now on a bookshelf. it also would be beautiful in the garden in the spring. we are in the middle of winter right now. I am very pleased with the quality of this item...very
customer_reviews.author: S. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a sad, sad time
customer_reviews.text: This was a perfect gift for my son who had to put his loved German Shepard down. It was a hard day, as you may know, and this arrived the day after. He loved it and it is now in a visible and honored place in his house.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn L

customer_reviews.title: Remember your best friend!
customer_reviews.text: Great product maoes me cry everytime I go out and look at it. I lost my beloved dog about 2 years ago and have been looking for a memorial all this time that felt right. I finally found in Evergreen enterprises plaque a memento suitable for my dear dear friend. Sturdy construction and a finely designed marker fit to remember your best friend by anytime you and others see it.
customer_reviews.author: Alstew2000

customer_reviews.title: Garden Pet Paw  Print Devotion
customer_reviews.text: Received a few days ago. It is very nice, though I would prefer not to have bought it. Our very beautiful, beloved Poodle passed away. We were very blessed to have our Lammy for 14 years. We miss him EVERY single day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... back and got a 2nd one because this is great. I also purchased a Krylon Paint Pen and ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 1 and came back and got a 2nd one because this is great. I also purchased a Krylon Paint Pen and wrote my pets names on it so it can go outside and be weather resistant.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Barker

customer_reviews.title: This was so much more beautiful than I expected it to be
customer_reviews.text: This was so much more beautiful than I expected it to be. Its of good quality and sets well as a marker for my dad's dogs grave. She was a beautiful dog. And my dad hung on to her for as long as he could. She was old... and truley "if love could have saved her, she would have lived forever" Couldn't be more true. It was quick shipping and the perfect size for a dogs grave. Thank you TNT Media Group, Inc. Pets! I'll surely order form you again.
customer_reviews.author: Misty M VanEpps

customer_reviews.title: Grave stone
customer_reviews.text: I bought a grave stone for my daughters dog. I was very pleased with it. She had her dog for 11 years & she is heartbroken. He is buried in her yard, so she will see the grave stone every day.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: You’ll be very satisfied with this, but sad you had to buy it at all
customer_reviews.text: This is the most heart-breaking purchase I’ve ever had to make, but I could not be more pleased with this lovely memorial of my furbaby’s life. This stepping stone/plaque is of great quality, is large in size so it doesn’t disappear in a garden (which is where I have it), and the inscription is absolutely the most moving and appropriate message to our beloved pets. I highly recommend this Paw Print Devotion Stepping Stone.
customer_reviews.author: Prettygirl

customer_reviews.title: Very, very nice plaque.
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised to see how nice this little tombstone plaque looks. The size and price of it is perfect for what I wanted to do for my two beloved dogs. I buried their ashes in my back garden, placed this plaque over their graves and planted two small roses bushes around it. It looks lovely and every time I look at it, it warms my heart to see that their ashes are in such a pretty and close by setting. I only wish that the plaque had room to write their names on it. But this is a small issue with me. I know their names well enough because it's written in my heart.
customer_reviews.author: Bookfan

customer_reviews.title: Seems like nice quality
customer_reviews.text: My little buddy died and I wanted to place a marker on his grave. I liked the saying on this one so I bought it. It's a heavy piece of plastic or whatever it''s made of and seems like it will stand the test of time. time will tell.....
customer_reviews.author: Billieg

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as I hoped - fast delivery - could not be more pleased. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: ❤️Lovely way to commemorate my fur-babies❤️
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to mark a place in my backyard for my furbabies since they were buried at my previous home. It’s a lovely marker that is made of quality material and has easy to read letters. I also purchased a memorial wind chime that is hung just above the marker in my garden. Together they provide a place for me to reflect on my sweet babies that have all passed the Rainbow Bridge🌈🐾🐕🐈❤️
customer_reviews.author: DezHankins

customer_reviews.title: Nice but thinner than expected/hoped (dimensions at top of incorrect)
customer_reviews.text: It look nice but it was much thinner than hoped (always good to check out all specs). It's about 1/2 thick and once laid on the ground, would easily be covered up/over by dirt, leaves, grass, etc. It's really 12" long, 8" wide (not 3" as stated at top of ad, although farther down it says 7.5"), and 1/2" thick. So I'm trying to think how I'll prop it up or put something under it to keep it off the ground. Hopefully it will hold up in the weather and the lettering will not fade.
customer_reviews.author: W. Sweger

customer_reviews.title: The message on the stone is so appropriate
customer_reviews.text: My daughter just lost her Old English Sheepdog. This was given to her as a memorial to "Woffles". She has placed it as a stepping stone where she sees it coming and going to her car.
customer_reviews.author: Janie Schaefer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: In the past 3 months, my husband and I lost one of my cats & his dog. This stone is perfect, since it has both dog & cat paw prints on it. It is thinner than I thought, bonus though is it is not heavy to move around. It's able to be hung on a wall as well, which surprised me! Once we get garden stones from our local hardware store to make a circle around the one tree we have, we're placing this at the base of the tree & planting forget-me-not flowers inside. I am very pleased with this product, it is a beautiful memorial to our beloved pets.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I was so impressed when I received this. A neighbor lost her precious fur baby and the saying on the stone gave me goosebumps. It says it all. The product is very well made and so substantial. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Manville

customer_reviews.title: Nice Remembrance
customer_reviews.text: Our son and Daugther in law lost their beautiful dog and since they live In Illinois and we live in California we couldn’t give them a hug so we sent this plaque. They were very toutched and actually hung it in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Love this stone.
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great stone. I love the saying and the cursive etching. It was a gift for a friend that lost his dog and he marked his grave with it and he was pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Keller

customer_reviews.title: Nice gift
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for my friend who lost her pup. I haven't seen it. But she described it as thin , so it's not something you can put in your garden and expect it to last
customer_reviews.author: Lorri2009

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: I was so impressed with how sturdy and well made the Stone was made. I bought two. One for myself, we lost a pet in January and another that just lost her pet. She loves it and has found a perfect place in the garden for it. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and a great value, but ..
customer_reviews.text: I did not like return process, they censored my review. The item is very nice and worth every penny, shipping was prompt. I ended up not being able to use it and the return rules are not visible. I basically got back half of the items cost because I returned it. This has never happened with items I have purchased that were shipped by the site.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great memorial to my best friend
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this in 2012 when I lost my best friend. Has been in the garden year round (Cleveland Ohio weather) since and still looks like I just got it. Just repurchased for a friend who just weren't through a loss.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Haas

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little memorial plaque.
customer_reviews.text: It's just like it is in the picture. Absolutely wonderful. The only small issue was the hole in the back to hang it was a little deformed. It wasn't an issue for me because I am using it as a headstone for my pup, but I think that was because I had so much other stuff sent to me in the same box from other amazon sellers. It's the sweetest little memorial. It brought me to tears when I opened the package. <3
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my dogs shrine. He passed away in 2018. Very sturdy and adds extra love wherever you put it. Definitely worth every penny I paid for it. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: charming commemorative
customer_reviews.text: I originally intended to put this outside as a stepping stone by my girl's solar light, but it is far too nice so I ended up using it as a wall hanging. Had to secure it well because it does have some weight to it. It seems to be a good quality and a nice way to remember a missed furry family member. I'm very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: S. Hendrickson

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and looks great
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my precious Delilah who went over the rainbow bridge. It makes her grave site look so beautiful, it even has room to get it engraved. Very beautiful piece.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Very Attractive
customer_reviews.text: This replaces a fiberglass headstone that got stepped on by a deer. I don't think this would survive that either, but probably nothing out there would. It's hefty and well made.
customer_reviews.author: MrLucky

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful piece for a great price! We placed this by a rose bush we planted to remember our 15 year old bichon that we lost a year ago and it is perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda P.

customer_reviews.title: Cute, as pictured
customer_reviews.text: It's as pictured. It's nice but it is a little thinner than I thought. I havent put it outside as I'm afraid of the weathering on it.
customer_reviews.author: BettyJo White

customer_reviews.title: Excellent gift !
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my friend who lost her dog. She just loved it and put it on his spot in the yard! Said it was a wonderful tribute to her Sheba.
customer_reviews.author: springsteensgirl

customer_reviews.title: A Nice message for our Dog.
customer_reviews.text: It is, what it is. Was delivered fine, We had the same marker for our Dead Dog, got broken by lawn mower, was happy to find the same one on-line. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Mad Stork

customer_reviews.title: Truer words were never written...
customer_reviews.text: When I lost my sweet, nearly 17 year old Schnauzer/Shitzu cross Sophie last month, I couldn't think of anything better to add to the river rocks I piled upon the grave I dug for her in the front yard, near the front porch she loved. The stone arrived within the week, wrapped carefully to keep it safe. It has provided comfort to me every time I see it! Thank you, Sophie, for being such a loyal, loving girl. I miss you!
customer_reviews.author: terrilea

customer_reviews.title: Helps with keeping a sweet memory of your pet
customer_reviews.text: We were given this item as a gift when our dog died and it made such a lasting impression on us that we have now bought this same item for friends of ours who have lost their pets. it always is well received and since you can place it in the lawn and have a reminder as you come and go, it is a real good way of keeping your memories alive.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Friedberg

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my dog that just recently passed. I love it !!!! I know it could be placed in your yard or garden but I bought a stand and placed it on my table next to her ashes, it looks beautiful. On Amazon the pictures show some differences in color which made me hestitate but I think it's just the lighting cause it was perfect. Highly recommend !!!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Royer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Memorial
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality item that will last for many years. It fits most decors and is a cherished gift fro anyone that has lost a beloved pet.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra K. Vogt

customer_reviews.title: It is very pretty and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this after the passing of my beloved Yorkie, Iggy. It is very pretty and sturdy. When it warms up I am going to put it in a flower bed planted close to Iggy's grave. It is thick enough to handle the weather and will be a special memento to my furbaby.
customer_reviews.author: Bebe

customer_reviews.title: Fine quality
customer_reviews.text: We were a little surprised at the actual size, bigger than expected. A simple commemoration of our loss is what we were looking for and your product easily fit our needs. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Web Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great garden piece
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this garden stone for my son who recently lost his beloved pet. It is very well constructed it looks very good and is a wonderful garden addition. The phrase if love could have saved you you would have live forever is very comforting.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly B

customer_reviews.title: The inscription
customer_reviews.text: I bought the pet markers for my friend who recently lost her beloved pet companion. When I saw the one we chose we both cried cause the inscription was heart moving. They are beautifully crafted. The only thing I wish it could've been personalized.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Steindler

customer_reviews.title: plaque
customer_reviews.text: I have lost pets in the last year and this plaque makes me think of them every time I pass it. It is readable from standing up. Would recommend to any pet owner
customer_reviews.author: dddog

customer_reviews.title: My friend loved it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for a dear friend who recently lost her dog. I was pleasantly surprised by the quality, especially given the price being so reasonable. I would definitely buy this product again! It's just as nice as other memorial pet stones I've seen for double and triple the price. It can be used as an outside garden stone or hung inside on a wall. Great gift idea for anyone who's lost a beloved pet.
customer_reviews.author: Melmo

customer_reviews.title: Quality !
customer_reviews.text: Loved it. Very sturdy. Nice big size. The saying was perfect. It would be nice if it was customizable, but its perfect.
customer_reviews.author: MzMarci

customer_reviews.title: Nice size and quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice addition to the arbor in our memorial garden for our loved pets. Great quality, very fast service, thank you.
customer_reviews.author: jerry

customer_reviews.title: The perfect stone for the perfect pet.
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought two of these because I had one Pat passed away last year and one this year, and this made the perfect headstone for both of them. The price was excellent and I saw the same product sold at a Ace hardware for three times the amount of money. Would definitely recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: justin w.

customer_reviews.title: Pet Paw Stepping Stone
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this. Good quality. We have placed it in our backyard in memory of our little pup who recently passed. Would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Hockey Mom

customer_reviews.title: Stone is even better than the picture!
customer_reviews.text: I am so pleased with this stone. It's a perfect part of the memorial for my perfect pets. Thanks so much.
customer_reviews.author: arlene33334

customer_reviews.title: Best tribute for my "bestest boy" who passed
customer_reviews.text: This is my wonderful puppy's headstone. I was so sad to have to order one, but this one makes a beautiful tribute to my "bestest boy". I miss him, and this headstone captures my sentiments exactly. The quality of the stone was good, and it looked exactly as pictured here.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Memorial Stone
customer_reviews.text: When my beautiful 14 year old dachshund unexpectedly got sick and passed away, I was looking for something to place in the backyard over her resting place. This garden stone was just the thing I was looking for. It arrived quickly and I was even able to write on the stone with Sharpie marker (her name and date of birth), and the ink has stayed on the stone (even after many rainfalls and 2 snowstorms). The lettering on the stone is also very touching and captured my feelings for my little dachshund perfectly,
customer_reviews.author: Saisha V. Brynczka

customer_reviews.title: Good quality quick delivery
customer_reviews.text: Lovely memorial gift for my brother who’s dog past after he did. Gifted it to my mom who placed it in her garden for my brother and his Elvis❣️True to size lovely carving and quality is nice
customer_reviews.author: Jbroom

customer_reviews.title: This is a very nice dog memorial
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice dog memorial. It looks like stone so would be good outside in the garden. It also has a place on the back that enables you to hang it, as well. Very sweet sentiment. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Casas

customer_reviews.title: Says what is engraved on my heart
customer_reviews.text: My best friend of 16 years died. I cried until there were no more tears. This capstone says everything that I couldn't say that day. The size was perfect for a small plot. The construction and finish are very weather resistant- as well as squirrel and raccoon resistant. I couldn't be more pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Signor

customer_reviews.title: Perfect in every way....
customer_reviews.text: This plaque is exactly what we were looking for to be propped against our beloved pets' gravestone in our back yard. It's substantially heavy enough not to be windswept. It also has a hook on the back for those who would like to hang it on a wall near a furbaby's picture. We couldn't be happier with this purchase. UPDATE: 10/18 Four years later and still holding up nicely. We DID have to darken the pawprint and writing with dark paint as there was some fading. Otherwise, perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Tbascoebuzz

customer_reviews.title: Heartfelt gift for anyone who has lost a pet
customer_reviews.text: This is much bigger than I thought it would be, and for that I am glad! It definitely made it more like a memorial stone. I'm not sure what's it's made of, perhaps a heavy plaster, but it's sturdy and large enough for a good display. I'm giving this to a friend who lost her dog this year. I know it will touch her as much as it touched me. Comes in a sturdy box with styrofoam to protect it :)
customer_reviews.author: doublerro

customer_reviews.title: Looks Beautiful in my Garden
customer_reviews.text: Seems very well made. I am using it around my Gazebo were I have a rock for each of my dogs that have gone to the rainbow bridge.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Oxley

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully made, beautifully worded! Purrfect!
customer_reviews.text: So sweet, so perfect! These words although painfully true, are soothing at the same time. I put it where my beloved kitty would lie down and roll around purring. One of his spots in front of the bay window where he knew I'd watch him. I have another plaque next to it that reads, "Play with the Angels.". I recommend this well made piece to anyone who has lost a very beloved pet. Reminds me of him everyday!
customer_reviews.author: A little of this; a lot of that!

customer_reviews.title: Great Memorial Gift
customer_reviews.text: We gave this to one of our family members who lost their pet dog of 12yrs. They absolutely loved this plaque. Highly recommend this as a gift to those who have lost pets.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth G. Fisher

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS
customer_reviews.text: This is wonderful. I lost my dog on 3/10/17. He made it to 15. I am heartbroken, this is perfect!!!LOVE IT
customer_reviews.author: Jersey Karen

customer_reviews.title: I would get again.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my kitten that past. I raised her from a baby till she passed. Its not the same without her. But I got this for her tiny grave and my neighbor came over and loved it. She wishes to get one for dog that passed away a year ago. I would get again cause it is beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Merideth

customer_reviews.title: Nicely crafted. Perfectly worded.
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this stone is very good. It is more a plaque than a stone but the texturing is done well. The engraving is very nicely done. The message, well, that is the main reason I bought this. Just perfect. I would love to have Gracie's name engraved too, but this is good for now.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Henry

customer_reviews.title: Very nice detail
customer_reviews.text: Does not look like stone like I hoped. It doesn't feel very sturdy. It's very detailed and it is still beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Janie

customer_reviews.title: Breezer I love you
customer_reviews.text: I love this for my Breezer who I had to put to sleep...Breezer I love you and you changed my life forever! This is great if you want to hang it on the wall too. It has a hook in the back. Nice stone for a remembrance of my little old man. The saying is so great. this could be a nice gift for someone who lost their loving pet. Its such a difficult time for those of us who value our animals. They truely mean so much.
customer_reviews.author: Sea Otter Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: Recently my neighbors dog passed away. We all loved Palmer like he was ours. I wanted to do something for them in remembrance of him. This item was perfect for the occasion.. I would buy it again. The only reason I did not give it a 5 * was because it is dark grey in color and I thought it would be lighter. My neighbors were overwhelmed with it.
customer_reviews.author: D. Rosenthal

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I love this stepping stone. I lost my precious pup I had with me for 15 years. I am making a memory garden and this will be an important part of that garden. So glad I found it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect delivery
customer_reviews.text: The condolence gifts were perfect! Delivery was so good and thoughtful how it was placed on my steps. Thanks so much! AAAA++++
customer_reviews.author: Pat Brevko

customer_reviews.title: Pawfect
customer_reviews.text: Pawfect for my pet cemetery. I thought it would be a big bigger, but it works fine. I hung it up on a post that is in my pet cemetery.
customer_reviews.author: P. R. Childers

customer_reviews.title: Inscription
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with this memorial stone.It was made out of a material that will withstand all types of weather.The inscription was absolutely perfect, it's a text was written in beautiful script.
customer_reviews.author: Rugrat

product_meta.title: Evergreen Garden Pet Paw Print Devotion Painted Polystone Stepping Stone - 12”W x 0.5”D x 7.5”H
feature_bullets: WE'LL ALWAYS REMEMBER: Makes a touching remembrance piece for your beloved dog, cat or oet who has passed, but will always be in your heart.
A SWEET STATEMENT: Engraving states: “If love could have saved you, you would have lived forever"

DISPLAY ANYWHERE: This painted polystone pet memorial stepping stone is accented with paw prints, and is Indoor/outdoor-safe - Treated with a special finish for protection against the sun and weather. Put the piece alongside a walkway, under your favorite tree, near a flower bed, or on a porch or patio.
FOREVER FRIEND: Pets are part of the family and deserve to be celebrated for the gift of love and companionship they bring.
THE RIGHT FIT: Measures approximately 12”W x 0 -5”D x 7 -5”H
